trans-unit.source: Represents the parameters for an SSL security token that is obtained when doing the SOAP-level SSL protocol with the server.
trans-unit.target: 서버와 SOAP 수준의 SSL 프로토콜을 수행할 때 가져온 SSL 보안 토큰에 대 한 매개 변수를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: This class is a collection of token properties and methods, and is used in creating security binding elements and tokens.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 토큰 속성 및 메서드의 컬렉션 이며 보안 바인딩 요소 및 토큰을 만드는 데 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters"></xref> class.

The new instance property values are set to their defaults: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.InclusionMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenInclusionMode>.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스 속성 값을 해당 기본값으로 설정 됩니다:- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.InclusionMode%2A>를 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenInclusionMode>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenInclusionMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.InclusionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.ReferenceStyle%2A> is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenReferenceStyle>.
- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.RequireDerivedKeys%2A> is set to `true`.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters"></xref> class.

The new instance property values are set to their defaults: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.InclusionMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenInclusionMode>.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스 속성 값을 해당 기본값으로 설정 됩니다:- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.InclusionMode%2A>를 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenInclusionMode>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenInclusionMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.InclusionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.ReferenceStyle%2A> is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenReferenceStyle>.
- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.RequireDerivedKeys%2A> is set to `true`.
<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters.RequireCancellation%2A> is set to `false`.
<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters.RequireClientCertificate%2A> is set to `requireClientCertificate`.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to require client certificate; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>클라이언트 인증서를 요구 하도록 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters"></xref> class from another instance.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters"> </xref> 다른 인스턴스에서 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The new instance property values are set to the corresponding values in `other`.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스 속성 값에 해당 값으로 설정 됩니다 `other`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The other instance of this class.
other is .
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters"></xref> class.

The new instance property values are set to their defaults: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.InclusionMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenInclusionMode>.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스 속성 값을 해당 기본값으로 설정 됩니다:- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.InclusionMode%2A>를 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenInclusionMode>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenInclusionMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.InclusionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.ReferenceStyle%2A> is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenReferenceStyle>.
- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.RequireDerivedKeys%2A> is set to `true`.
<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters.RequireCancellation%2A> is set to `requireCancellation`.
<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters.RequireClientCertificate%2A> is set to `requireClientCertificate`.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to require client certificate; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>클라이언트 인증서를 요구 하도록 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to require cancellation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>취소; 요구 하도록 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Clones another instance of this instance of the class.
trans-unit.target: 클래스의이 인스턴스의 다른 인스턴스를 복제 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.Clone%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.CloneCore%2A> methods follow the Core design pattern.
CloneCore overrides <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.CloneCore%2A>.
The CloneCore method calls the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters> instance that represents the copy.
Creates a key identifier clause for a token.
trans-unit.target: 토큰에 대 한 키 식별자 절을 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: This method creates a key identifier clause using the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.CreateKeyIdentifierClause%2A> method, with `referenceStyle` as a generic parameter.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 사용 하 여 키 식별자 절을 만듭니다는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.CreateKeyIdentifierClause%2A>메서드를와 `referenceStyle` 제네릭 매개 변수로.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.CreateKeyIdentifierClause%2A>

trans-unit.source: The token.
The reference style of the security token.
The key identifier clause for a token.
trans-unit.target: 토큰에 대 한 키 식별자 절입니다.

trans-unit.source: token is .
referenceStyle is not or .
trans-unit.target: referenceStyleis not or .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the token has an asymmetric key.
trans-unit.target: 토큰에 비대칭 키가 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This property always returns `false`.
Asymmetric keys are used in public-key cryptography, which uses two keys, a public key and a private key, which are related mathematically.
trans-unit.target: 비대칭 키는 수학적으로 관련이 두 개의 키, 공개 키 및 개인 키를 사용 하는 공개 키 암호화에 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The public key is distributed widely, but the private key is kept secret.
trans-unit.target: 공개 키는 폭 넓게 배포 되지만 개인 키는 기밀로 유지 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: In public-key cryptography, there is no need to exchange a common key.
trans-unit.target: 공개 키 암호화에서는 공통 키를 교환할 필요가 없습니다 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the token has an asymmetric key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>토큰에 비대칭 키. 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a security token requirement.

The following properties of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement> are initialized: - If <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters.RequireClientCertificate%2A> is `true`, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement.TokenType%2A> = <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.ServiceModelSecurityTokenTypes.MutualSslnego%2A>; otherwise, it is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.ServiceModelSecurityTokenTypes.AnonymousSslnego%2A>.
- <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement.RequireCryptographicToken%2A> = `true`.

- The `SupportSecurityContextCancellation` property in <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement.Properties%2A> is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters.RequireCancellation%2A>.
- The `IssuedSecurityTokenParameters` property in <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement.Properties%2A> is set to a clone of the current instance.
- <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement.KeyType%2A> = <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyType>.
The requirement of the security token.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether cancellation is required.
trans-unit.target: 취소가 필요한 지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If cancellation is required, then the security context token issued at the end of the SSL protocol is session based; otherwise, it is cookie based.
trans-unit.target: 취소가 필요 하면 다음 SSL 프로토콜의 끝에서 발급 된 보안 컨텍스트 토큰은 세션 기반 이며; 그렇지 않으면 쿠키를 기반으로 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if cancellation is required; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>취소가 필요; 하면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a client certificate is required.
trans-unit.target: 클라이언트 인증서가 필요한 지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a client certificate is required; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>클라이언트 인증서가 필요한; 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
When implemented, gets a value that indicates whether the token supports client authentication.
trans-unit.target: 구현 시 토큰이 클라이언트 인증을 지원 하는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the token supports client authentication; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>토큰이 클라이언트 인증을 지 원하는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: When implemented, gets a value that indicates whether the token supports a Windows identity for authentication.
trans-unit.target: 구현 시 토큰이 인증을 위해 Windows id를 지원 하는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the token supports a Windows identity for authentication; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>토큰이 인증;에 대 한 Windows id를 지원 하는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: When implemented, gets a value that indicates whether the token supports server authentication.
trans-unit.target: 구현 시 토큰이 서버 인증을 지원 하는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This property always returns `false`.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the token supports server authentication; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>토큰이 서버 인증을 지 원하는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Displays a text representation of this instance of the class.

The method displays the name of this class, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters.RequireCancellation%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters.RequireClientCertificate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스의 이름을 표시 하는 메서드가 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters.RequireCancellation%2A>, 및 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters.RequireClientCertificate%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters.RequireClientCertificate%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters.RequireCancellation%2A>

trans-unit.source: A text representation of this instance of the class.
